text: Kozhay-Andreyevo () is a rural locality (a selo) in Karatovsky Selsoviet, Tuymazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 25 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 45 km from Tuymazy, 7 km from Karatovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tuymazinsky District
title: Kozhay-Andreyevo
